Fault.name: BPEL/BPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Make sure that value "client:BPELProcessRequestMessage" is resolvable (check imports, value of "messageType").
Fault.msg: "messageType" is set to "client:BPELProcessRequestMessage" on this <bpel:variable> but it cannot be resolved (check value of "messageType", imports, WSDLs or XSDs).

Fault.name: BPEL/BPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Add a predicate to select an element from the sequence.
Fault.msg: The XPath segment "child::ns3:Emplyees" selects a sequence of elements - a predicate MAY be needed to correctly select an element.
